titleStmt.title: His Majesties letter to the Lord Bishop of London, to be communicated to the two provinces of Canterbury and York.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall the 13th day of February, 1689/90. In the second year of Our Reign.
